Articles.Content:
This is the opposite of kerbal history, this is a forum game about the future of kerbals!

Rule 1: Be understandable.

Rule 2: Maximum of 3 "Time Spotlights". Time spotlights are for example: Year 100 = KSC explodes from nuclear waste in the astronaut's tacos.

-------------------------------------------------------------

Year 3 after KSC: The KSC was an amazing success. A mission to Alpha Kerbtauri is planned. Scientists are thinking of how to go to the system in less than 20 years of time.

Year 20 after KSC: Scientists are still wondering until they find a material on Gilly called "Kendurium". Said material is 20x stronger than regular fuel for normal engines and with specific engine configurations the material can go stronger than 1000x.

Year 50 after KSC: A craft is sent to Alpha Kerbtauri. It will arrive in two years. Once there, it will be a colony for astronauts to live in.

year 7,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000 After KSC

the universe collapses and all kerbals still living die

Edited April 16, 2017 by StupidAndy

yep in the meanwhile you can play starmade made in sun java microsystem oracle unix ... yeah you know matrix the oracle the architect ... an old guy an old women ohohoh

with luck when photon die tired there another floating tralalala in the void very far so far that we can't see, ki,nda like two molecule in the primitive soup ... that meet each other ... or your stomach or whatever
